settings.editor: Every month, we feature a unique video of our upcoming tie-ups new recipes, or including new cultures to improve and update our specialized menu. Have a look at this month's feature plan.

settings.title: Do we provide hassle free experience?
If just a quick doubt comes to your mind, then, have a look:

tabs.tab_title: How can I create my order ?
tabs.tab_content: Just click on the Order Now button, in navigation bar and select your cuisine and wait for your order, at your doorstep.

tabs.tab_title: I'm sure I've booked, but I haven't had confirmation - what now?
tabs.tab_content: We will always send you an automated confirmation when your booking is confirmed at the restaurant. If you haven't received a confirmation, please start the process again. If you continue to have an issue please give us a call us during business hours or drop us a line and we'll be in touch to resolve the issue.

tabs.tab_title: What happens if I get to the restaurant and they don't have my booking?
tabs.tab_content: Restaurant Hub restaurants are committed to honour any confirmed bookings we have generated. For added peace of mind you should always reconfirm your booking using the the link included in your reminder email, and it's also a good idea to take your confirmation email with you.

tabs.tab_title: How can I be certain my booking's been received?
tabs.tab_content: We'll send an instant confirmation email to the address used in your booking. If you book more than a day ahead, we'll also send a reminder 24 hours before your booking is due. You can reconfirm your booking using a link in your reminder email.

tabs.tab_title: What if I incur a problem in receiving the online food orders, whom will I contact?
tabs.tab_content:
All the requests and questions are managed by us here. 

To get a swift response navigate to Get In Touch and fill out the form, as for us the work is prioritized appropriately.

tabs.tab_title: How do I cancel a booking?
tabs.tab_content:
To help our restaurants manage their sittings we ask our diners to give at least 24 hours' notice of any cancellations. You can do this by calling your restaurant direct.

If you need to cancel less than 24 hours before your dinner date you can use the cancellation link within your reminder email (sent 24 hours before your reservation time). We also encourage our diners to follow this up with a call direct to the restaurant.

To amend a booking please call the restaurant direct, again endeavouring to give at least 24 hours' notice.

tabs.tab_title: Why do you need my email address?
tabs.tab_content: All Restaurant Hub bookings are automatically confirmed via email. Without an address to send the confirmation to the booking can't be accepted. We'll also use your email address to send reminders for any bookings made more than 24 hours in advance of your dining date.

tabs.tab_title: How much do I have to pay for my booking?
tabs.tab_content: Absolutely nothing! All bookings made through Restaurant Hub are free to the consumer.
